dct_description_sm: drawn under the direction of Mr. Pinkerton by L. Hebert ; Neele sculpt. ; Scale approximately 1:4,000,000(E 22⁰--E 49⁰/N 25⁰--N 8⁰) ; Relief shown by hachures and pictorially ; Major regions shown by hand-colored borders ; Across top: 'Pinkerton's modern atlas.' ; Detached from John Pinkerton : Modern atlas ; London : Cadell & Davies, & Longman, Hurst, Rees, Orme and Brown; Source: Pinkerton, John, 1758-1826. Modern atlas. London : Printed by T. Bensley for T. Cadell and W. Davies and Longman, Hurst, Rees, Orme and Brown, 1815, number 56.
dct_creator_sm: Longman, Hurst, Rees, Orme, and Brown
dct_publisher_sm: Cadell & Davies, & Longman, Hurst, Rees, Orme and Brown
dct_rights_sm: The images on this web site, from maps in the collection of the Melville J. Herskovits Library of African Studies and housed in the Government & Geographic Information Collection of Northwestern University Libraries are in the public domain in the United States, and as such, not subject to copyright restriction. The Libraries request users cite both the URL and Northwestern University Libraries if they wish to reproduce images from the repository. For access to higher resolution images please contact repository@northwestern.edu
